jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
PayMonk is looking for a talented and self-driven Full Stack Developer who loves technical challenges and will lay the foundations for our new software in a highly collaborative, fast-paced, high-energy environment. He will be responsible for developing and maintaining server-side web applications and collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and build scalable and high-performance applications. We are re-building a platform for customer banking, secure onboarding, integrations with external systems, wallets, payments, lending, risk mitigation, and analytics to drive intelligence from customer interaction patterns. It's an exciting time to join the team as we're setting the approach, design, and architecture for a holistic B2B & B2C technology offering.


Responsibilities:

  • Technical Leadership: Lead and mentor a team of developers, providing technical guidance and ensuring best practices. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deliver scalable fintech solutions.
  • Full Stack Development: Design, develop, and maintain both front-end and back-end components of fintech applications. Implement responsive and user-friendly web interfaces using modern front-end frameworks. Ensure seamless integration of front-end and back-end components.
  • Develop and Maintain Backend Systems: Design, implement, and maintain backend components and services using Java and related technologies.
  • Node JS: The Node JS Developer will be responsible for developing and maintaining server-side web applications and collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and build scalable and high-performance applications.
  • API Development: Create and manage APIs to support front-end functionalities, ensuring seamless integration and communication between front-end and back-end systems.
  • Database Management: Design and optimize database schemas, write efficient queries, and ensure data integrity and performance.
  • Security and Compliance: Implement robust security measures to protect sensitive financial data, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.
  • Performance Optimization: Monitor application performance, identify bottlenecks, and improve application efficiency and scalability.


Requirements:

  • Passion for building and refining high-performance software applications.
  • Experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining complex applications.
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript and frameworks such as Node.js and Express.js .
  • Experience with database technologies such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL.
  • Knowledge of front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
  • Experience with version control systems such as Git.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and web services.
  • Understanding of asynchronous programming techniques.
  • Knowledge of software testing and debugging.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Good communication and teamwork skills.
  • Full stack developer with 3+ years of hands-on experience with AWS, React, React Native, and Java.
  • Strictly experience in the fintech industry.
  • Education: Bachelor's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.

benefits: Opportunity to work on latest and greatest technology

jobs.title: Application Engineer
jobs.description:
As an Application Engineer (AE) at Flipkart, you will be responsible for ensuring application health, optimizing software application performance, debugging the code to identify the code fix, delivering long-term bug fixes to reduce operational load, and influencing product management and product development to achieve operational and engineering excellence. The AE will also identify and automate the right self-serve tools and implement fixes to address the issues systematically and will manage the sustenance of stable software applications as well.


This is an important, very high ownership and customer-first attitude role within the company, and our expectations are equally high. Your solutions will impact what customers will experience when they place orders at Flipkart! Your ability to learn quickly and work on disparate and overlapping tasks will define your success. High-impact production issues often require coordination between multiple Development, Operations, and IT Support groups, so you get to experience a breadth of impact with various groups.


Responsibilities:

  • Perform analyses on software application functionality and suggest improvements.
  • Ensure application health of front-end and back-end applications.
  • Identify and automate self-serve tools, and implement fixes, enhancements, and minor features in the product/platform.
  • Provide software application support for all the applications owned by a business unit/team.
  • Consult with the software development team, internal users, and clients to improve application performance.
  • Manage code migration across environments to ensure continued and synchronized functionality.
  • Establishing the root causes of application errors followed by delivering a permanent code fix.
  • Escalate serious issues to the Senior Engineer to ensure application health is back to normal ASAP
  • Keeping a record of configuration changes and scheduling application updates.
  • Documenting processes and monitoring application performance metrics.
  • Provide support to clients and colleagues in other departments as needed.


Requirements:

  • A bachelor's degree in software engineering, computer science, information technology, information systems, computer engineering, or similar.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills.
  • Demonstrable experience as an application engineer in a related field(1.5-4 years).
  • Good hands-on experience with Unix/Linux and one of the scripting languages (Unix/JavaScript etc. )
  • Advanced knowledge of front-end and back-end programming languages, such as C++, Java, Python, and Ruby, etc.
  • Ability to manage code migration, document configuration changes, and monitor performance.
  • Exceptional ability to provide front-end support to internal departments and web-based clients.
  • Advanced proficiency in determining the causes of application errors and fixing them permanently
  • Knowledge of Advanced Encryption Standards (AES) and how to ensure security across all applications
  • Exceptional communication skills.

jobs.title: Mern Stack Developer
jobs.description:
This is a full-time on-site role for a Mern Stack Developer at Nadcab Labs located in Prayagraj. As a Mern Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js ) stack. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to create innovative solutions and ensure the scalability and performance of our applications.


Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient web applications using Mongo DB, Express.js, ReactJS, and Node.js technologies.
  • Develop server-side web applications using Express.js, a web application framework for Node.js, to manage routes and middleware.
  • Use Node.js to build scalable and efficient server-side applications, handling server logic and API integration.
  • Work with MongoDB, a NoSQL database, to store and retrieve data efficiently. Design database schemas and optimize queries for performance.
  • Connect the front-end and back-end components of the application to ensure seamless communication and data flow between the client and server.
  • Design and implement RESTful APIs for communication between the front-end and back-end, ensuring proper data exchange.
  • Integrate third-party APIs and services to enhance application functionality.
  • Write and execute unit tests to ensure the reliability and stability of the application.
  • Identify and resolve issues and bugs in both front-end and back-end components through effective debugging techniques.
  • Use version control systems like Git to manage and track changes in the codebase, collaborating with other developers in a team environment.
  • Deploy applications to servers or cloud platforms, ensuring proper configuration and optimization for production environments.
  • Implement DevOps practices to automate deployment processes and enhance the overall development workflow.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, other developers, and stakeholders, to understand requirements and deliver effective solutions.
  • Maintain documentation for code, APIs, and project-related information to facilitate knowledge transfer and future development.
  • Keep abreast of the latest trends and updates in web development, particularly within the MERN stack, to incorporate best practices and technologies into projects.


Requirements:

  • Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and related front-end technologies.
  • Experience with the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js ) stack.
  • Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and web services.
  • Experience with version control systems (e. g., Git).

  • Understanding of agile development methodologies.

company_tagline: Bringing people together to collaborate and communicate effectively

At SDP Labs we build web based apps that brings people together to collaborate and communicate effectively. Over the years, we have built on our humble beginnings - from a simple idea - to innovative products that help people get work done faster, together.


When SDP Labs was started back in 2007, a few things were certain: we loved Internet, Simplicity, Technology and wanted to help people get more work done faster. We always longed for that one place wherein we could convert our ideas into reality and wanted to have fun while doing so. But because we couldn't find a place to do all of that, we decided to create one.


In the years that followed, we evolved, gained perspective, and created what we always felt the need of. 1 product turned into many. Employees became family. Clients became friends. And, our work became our lifeline. Each time our clients place their trust in us, we pass that trust on to our employees, and our employees give it back to our clients by delivering innovative solutions and outstanding service. With that mindset, we've helped hundreds of businesses and start-ups improve the way they work.


And, as we move forward we have set our sights high on being worthy, innovative and informed problem-solvers who aren't afraid of getting their hands dirty. Our thanks goes out to our clients and users who have helped us get this far, and for their priceless suggestions that have shaped who we are as a brand in this community.

interview_process:
Our typical Interview process comprises of major three steps:


1. Telephonic screen: takes 10-15 minutes to determine a match based on skills and capabilities

2. Assignment: typically takes 2 hours, but could take longer depending on how successful you are at tackling the requirements.

3. F2F round: typically takes around 2-3 hours in total. This will involve meeting two different sets of team members, presenting & defending your assignment, we will also discover your character and attitude with our line of questions during this Interview.

summary:
StreamYard is a versatile all-in-one platform that empowers people to easily go live and create professional live streams, recordings, podcasts, and webinars directly from their web browser. Launch a high-quality live stream to Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, and LinkedIn Live while interviewing guests and sharing the screen with just a few clicks. Record podcasts with our local recording feature that creates crystal clear audio and video every time so people can focus on the message, not the technology. Host impactful webinars using our on-air feature that handles registrations can be embedded on the website and much more. StreamYard removes all the complexities so they can deliver messages flawlessly to build the brand, grow audiences, and engage with the community.


We think live streaming is a great medium for storytelling - and telling great stories benefits everyone. Whether someone is a creator, content marketer, entrepreneur, or just someone with something to say, live streaming is an exciting and effective way to spread the message. But live streaming tools are very complicated. Someone shouldn't need to spend thousands of dollars on a computer or learn about encoding, just to start live streaming. The world misses out on so many great creators because of these barriers.


Dan and I thought there should be a streaming tool that anyone could use - a tool that was fun instead of stressful - a tool that was simple, but powerful enough to create engaging content. We wanted people who weren't techy, or who simply didn't want to deal with the hassle of streaming, to still go live, share their stories, and grow their communities.


StreamYard is built on those pillars. Our users tell us that StreamYard makes streaming fun - people can quickly create engaging content with guests, show on-screen comments/lower thirds, and brand their broadcasts with themes, overlays, and backgrounds. They don't need to know anything about technology or streaming to get started. And even though StreamYard is simple, techy folks love how powerful it is under the hood, and how effective it is for streaming group discussions.

jobs.title: Academic Counsellor
jobs.description:
As an Academic Counsellor at USDC Global in Gurgaon and Bangalore, you will be responsible for providing guidance and support to students in academic matters, career planning, and personal development. Your role will involve understanding the educational needs and goals of students, providing them with relevant information about courses and programs offered by the institution, and assisting them in making informed decisions about their academic and professional futures.


Responsibilities:

  • Conduct one-on-one counseling sessions with students to assess their academic needs, career aspirations, and personal interests.
  • Provide information and guidance on academic programs, course requirements, admission procedures, and career opportunities available at USDC Global.
  • Assist students in identifying their strengths, weaknesses, and areas for improvement, and develop personalized academic plans to help them achieve their goals.
  • Address student queries and concerns regarding academics, course content, grading policies, and other related matters.
  • Maintain accurate records of student interactions, counselling sessions, and academic progress to ensure effective tracking and follow-up.
  • Collaborate with academic advisors, faculty members, and other support staff to provide holistic support to students and promote their academic success.
  • Participate in orientation programs, workshops, and other student engagement activities to promote student retention and success.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Education, Psychology, Counselling, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 0-3 years of experience in academic counseling, student advising, or related roles.
  • Knowledge of academic programs, admission processes, and educational trends in higher education.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with students and provide empathetic support.
  • Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities, with a student-centered approach to counseling.
  • Familiarity with counseling techniques, assessment tools, and career development resources.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office and student information systems for record-keeping and data management.


Required Skills:

  • Counselling and advisory skills.
  • Communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Empathy and active listening skills.
  • Problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
  • Organization and time management skills.
  • Computer literacy and data management skills.

company_tagline: Language equality on internet

The Reverie Language Platform delivers static and dynamic content from apps and portals in multiple languages in real-time. Language localisation by Reverie is domain-savvy. This means that we know that the word "play" can mean different things in different localisation contexts.


Reverie delivers language localisation across a number of customer segments such as chipset manufacturers, mobile brands, consumer Internet, banks & financial institutions, governments, entertainment, education and more. Reverie's Language Platform is also used in user interaction technologies that includes Reverie's multilingual keypad, Swalekh. Swalekh enables typing in 16 Indian languages in native, phonetic, and Indlish (Macaronic) modes. It is available free on Google Play.
